long_description: Find the best trails you can hike in a day-this updated guide uncovers unparalleled hikes for the day tripper. Author: Mike McQuaide. Softcover; 278 pages; black-and-white photographs and maps. Sasquatch Books; copyright 2008. Classic day routes selected specifically for day hiking at Snoqualmie Pass, Alpine Lakes Wilderness and Stevens Pass in Washington state; organized by major highways. Each hike is rated on a scenery scale of 1 to 5 and includes difficulty ratings and detailed route descriptions. Includes pass information, recommended USGS maps, altitude gain and loss and management contacts. Quick-reference chart displays best season, overall rating, and whether the hike is recommended for kids and dogs. Easy-to-use topographic maps and small, inset elevation profiles.
short_description: Find the best trails you can hike in a day-this updated guide uncovers unparalleled hikes for the day tripper.
